name: Immunocompromised
description:
Welcome to Immunocompromised ____________________________________ Overview:

You take control of a White Blood Cell whose main objective is to protect and defend the human body by combating the horde of viral infections through shooting and utilizing power-ups. The variations of enemies will not make it easy for you to win over, and their Master awaits at the end.

Game Features:
  • A contemporary revamp of a shoot’em up 70’s arcade classic.
  • Shoot down all invading viruses, bacteria, and disease attempting to destroy your well-being.
  • Your immunocompromised system invites more trouble, as you progress through the stages.
  • Utilize everything at your disposal! From power-ups to frontliners, we’ve got it all for you to defend yourself and defeat all invaders.
  • Includes at least 6 different enemy types with each of their own strengths and weaknesses
ENEMY VARIATIONS!                                                                                                    

                                        

POWERUPS! FINAL BOSS?
